## About this document

This document was written in RMarkdown using `papaja` [@R-papaja] and serves 
as a project report for our research group.
The document is written as if it were the results section of a future 
manuscript.
This implies that it is written in a way that allows it to be copy and pasted 
into the actual manuscript once it is available.

## Session info
